Cave of Pandemonium.name: Cave of Pandemonium
Cave of Pandemonium.description: Cacophonous noise echoes from an otherwise hidden cavern.  You cannot see within.

success.text: You leave with impressive stealth, though it seems unnecessary.

failure.text: You leave, stomping and shouting, but nobody can hear a thing regardless.

Inside the Noisy Cave.name: Inside the Noisy Cave
Inside the Noisy Cave.description: YOU MOVE INTO THE CAVE.  YOU THINK YOU SEE A LIGHT FURTHER INSIDE.  IT IS RED.

failure.text: As you approach, you realize you've charged a Golem.  You know your strength is wildly insufficient, and so you fall back and stay alive
You barely step forward when the light turns to face you and begins pulsing.  You leg it out of the cave.

success.text: You sneak out of the cave unnoticed.

failure.text: You leg it out of the cave, pursued by something you can't see.

Barely Bested By The Golem.name: Barely Bested By The Golem
Barely Bested By The Golem.description: You almost take the golem down, but an explosion interrupts you, knocking you out.  When you awake, a lady with crispy hair stands over you with a powder grenade.

Barely Caught By The Golem.name: Barely Caught By The Golem
Barely Caught By The Golem.description: You almost sneak around the back of the cave, but an explosion interrupts you, knocking you out.  When you awake, a lady with crispy hair stands over you with a powder grenade.

Joined by Crazy Explosive Lady.name: Joined by Crazy Explosive Lady
Joined by Crazy Explosive Lady.description: You realize you don't have a choice in the matter.  The madwoman demands to join your party, and shifts the grenade to explain that you don't have a choice.

success.text: Crazy Explosion Lady joins your party
